{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Mind Plate |image = [[File:Mind_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Mind Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Psychic}} }} ==Description== The '''Mind Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Mind Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Psychic Gems]] {{Gem|Psychic}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Mind Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Tanoby Ruins|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pinkan Mountain|Epic}} {{LootItem|Whirl Islands|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt. Pyre|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Sky Pillar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Hoenn|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Solaceon Ruins|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake Valor|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake Verity|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake Acuity|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Fullmoon Island|Epic}} {{LootItem|Liberty Garden|Epic}} {{LootItem|Castelia Sewers|Epic}} {{LootItem|Celestial Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Cave of Being|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dreamyard|Epic}} {{LootItem|Reflection Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Epic}} {{LootItem|Aether Foundation|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake of the Sunne and Moone|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Life|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
